nodes.text: Starships and Vehicles of Revenge of the Sith

Starships and Vehicles of Revenge of the Sith is an online supplement for Star Wars Roleplaying Game. It was written by Gary M. Sarli and published on the Wizards of the Coast website on August 11, 2005. The article provides both in-universe characteristics and game stats for various vehicles and vessels from Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith.
